title: Mylordin
author: Mylordin
content: Selling Cloud AccountsEc2 - 32 vcpus limit / 7$Google 300$ for 90 days / 23$Azure 200$ 30 day + pay as you go + free service 365 limited traffic - register 3+ day ago / 6$Linode - balance 100$ / 10$Digital Ocean 100$ credit - 10 limit / 9$Kamatera Cloud / 7$Alibaba cloud / 8$Oracle cloud 250$ credit / 11$Other cloud services - It is possible to create under the order.Contact Details :Telegram @smakking

comments.author: min42
comments.body: C_Smile / vvccland renamed himself to Mylordin / smakking. This is a scammer.

comments.author: incrediable
comments.body: Quote from: min42 on October 21, 2022, 06:16:08 PMC_Smile / vvccland renamed himself to Mylordin / smakking. This is a scammer. Is he a scammer? was going to msg him for azure and aws. damn, why do I never wonder who's legitimate here at all.
